languages.text: Бывшая префект была приговорена до конца жизни вести учет десятины. Несколько лет она ютилась в крошечной каморке, заваленной бумагами, пока не почувствовала, что жизнь покидает ее иссохшее тело. Тогда она собрала своих немногочисленных подчиненных и скрупулезно передала дела. Последними ее словами были: "Список оглашен полностью, клерк второго ранга Инскрибия Вультур покидает должность по причине смерти".

The former prefect was sentenced to tithe accounting duty for the rest of her life. For several years, she inhabited a tiny room stacked with papers, until one day, she felt the life going out of her withered body. She assembled her few subordinates and meticulously handed over her various responsibilities. Her final words were: "This completes the reading of the list. Rank two clerk Inscribia Vultur is hereby stepping down for death-related reasons."

Несколько лет она ютилась в крошечной каморке, заваленной бумагами, пока не почувствовала, что жизнь покидает ее иссохшее тело. Тогда она собрала своих немногочисленных подчиненных и скрупулезно передала дела. Последними ее словами были: "Список оглашен полностью, клерк второго ранга Инскрибия Вультур покидает должность по причине смерти".

traits.locale_text: The former prefect was sentenced to tithe accounting duty for the rest of her life. For several years, she inhabited a tiny room stacked with papers, until one day she felt life leave her withered body. She then assembled her few subordinates and was meticulous in handing over her responsibilities. Her last words were: "This completes the reading of the list. Rank two clerk Inscribia Vultur is hereby resigning for death-related reasons."

languages.text: Die frühere Präfektin wurde zu lebenslangem Zehntverwaltungsdienst verurteilt. Mehrere Jahre verbrachte sie in einem winzigen Zimmer voller Papier, bis sie eines Tages spürte, wie das Leben ihren verwelkten Körper verließ. Sie versammelte ihre wenigen Untergebenen und übergab ihnen akribisch ihre diversen Verpflichtungen. Ihre letzten Worte lauteten: "Damit ist die Abarbeitung der Liste abgeschlossen. Inscribia Vultur, Beamtin zweiten Ranges, tritt wegen Tod zurück."
languages.original_text: The former prefect was sentenced to tithe accounting duty for the rest of her life. For several years, she inhabited a tiny room stacked with papers, until one day, she felt the life going out of her withered body. She assembled her few subordinates and meticulously handed over her various responsibilities. Her final words were: "This completes the reading of the list. Rank two clerk Inscribia Vultur is hereby stepping down for death-related reasons."

traits.locale_text: Die frühere Präfektin wurde zu lebenslangem Zehntverwaltungsdienst verurteilt. Mehrere Jahre verbrachte sie in einem winzigen Zimmer voller Papier, bis sie eines Tages spürte, wie das Leben ihren verwelkten Körper verließ. Sie versammelte ihre wenigen Untergebenen und übergab ihnen akribisch ihre diversen Verpflichtungen. Ihre letzten Worte lauteten: "Damit ist die Abarbeitung der Liste abgeschlossen. Inscribia Vultur, Beamtin zweiten Ranges, tritt wegen Tod zurück."

languages.text: Condamnée à gérer les comptes de la dîme jusqu'à sa mort, l'ancienne préfète occupa plusieurs années durant une pièce minuscule encombrée de montagnes de papiers, et ce, jusqu'au jour où elle sentit la vie quitter son corps flétri. Elle réunit alors ses quelques subordonnés et répartit entre eux ses différentes responsabilités. Ses derniers mots : « Voilà qui achève la lecture de cette liste. La greffière de rang 2 Inscribia Vultur quitte son poste pour des raisons de décès. »
languages.original_text: The former prefect was sentenced to tithe accounting duty for the rest of her life. For several years, she inhabited a tiny room stacked with papers, until one day, she felt the life going out of her withered body. She assembled her few subordinates and meticulously handed over her various responsibilities. Her final words were: "This completes the reading of the list. Rank two clerk Inscribia Vultur is hereby stepping down for death-related reasons."

traits.locale_text: Condamnée à gérer les comptes de la dîme jusqu'à sa mort, l'ancienne préfète occupa plusieurs années durant une pièce minuscule encombrée de montagnes de papiers, et ce, jusqu'au jour où elle sentit la vie quitter son corps flétri. Elle réunit alors ses quelques subordonnés et répartit entre eux ses différentes responsabilités. Ses derniers mots : « Voilà qui achève la lecture de cette liste. La greffière de rang 2 Inscribia Vultur quitte son poste pour des raisons de décès. »

languages.text: 前任行政官被判处审核什一税资源，直到生命结束为止。多年来，她始终待在某个堆满了文件的小房间里。某天，她感觉生命即将离开了她枯萎的身体，于是便召集来了为数不多的几位下属，一丝不苟地移交了自己的所有职责。她的临终遗言是：“资源清单就此阅读完毕。二级文员缮师·沃尔图尔由于死亡原因，即刻卸任。”
languages.original_text: The former prefect was sentenced to tithe accounting duty for the rest of her life. For several years, she inhabited a tiny room stacked with papers, until one day, she felt the life going out of her withered body. She assembled her few subordinates and meticulously handed over her various responsibilities. Her final words were: "This completes the reading of the list. Rank two clerk Inscribia Vultur is hereby stepping down for death-related reasons."

前任行政官被判处审核什一税资源，直到生命结束为止。多年来，她始终待在某个堆满了文件的小房间里。某天，她感觉生命即将离开了她枯萎的身体，于是便召集来了为数不多的几位下属，一丝不苟地移交了自己的所有职责。她的临终遗言是：“资源清单就此阅读完毕。二级文员缮师·沃尔图尔由于死亡原因，即刻解除职务。”

languages.text: La antigua prefecta quedó sentenciada a supervisar la contabilidad del diezmo durante el resto de su vida. Durante muchos años, vivió en una salita repleta de papeles, hasta que un día sintió que la vida abandonaba su cuerpo marchitado. Reunió a sus pocos subordinados y repartió exhaustivamente sus distintas responsabilidades. Sus últimas palabras fueron: «Así queda completada la lectura de la lista. Por la presente, la funcionaria de rango dos Inscribia Vultur deja su cargo por motivo de fallecimiento».
languages.original_text: The former prefect was sentenced to tithe accounting duty for the rest of her life. For several years, she inhabited a tiny room stacked with papers, until one day, she felt the life going out of her withered body. She assembled her few subordinates and meticulously handed over her various responsibilities. Her final words were: "This completes the reading of the list. Rank two clerk Inscribia Vultur is hereby stepping down for death-related reasons."

traits.locale_text: La antigua prefecta quedó sentenciada a supervisar la contabilidad del diezmo durante el resto de su vida. Durante muchos años, vivió en una salita repleta de papeles, hasta que un día sintió que la vida abandonaba su cuerpo marchitado. Reunió a sus pocos subordinados y repartió exhaustivamente sus distintas responsabilidades. Sus últimas palabras fueron: «Así queda completada la lectura de la lista. Por la presente, la funcionaria de rango dos Inscribia Vultur deja su cargo por motivo de fallecimiento».

languages.text: かつての総監は、生涯にわたって租税の会計業務を命じられた。数年間、彼女は書類の山に囲まれた狭い部屋に住み続け、ある日、やせ細った体から生命が失われていくのを感じた。彼女はわずかな部下を集め、様々な責務を丁寧に引き継いだ。最後の言葉はこうだった。「これにて名簿の読み上げを終えます。二等事務官インスクリビア・ヴァルターは、死亡に伴う理由により辞任いたします」
languages.original_text: The former prefect was sentenced to tithe accounting duty for the rest of her life. For several years, she inhabited a tiny room stacked with papers, until one day, she felt the life going out of her withered body. She assembled her few subordinates and meticulously handed over her various responsibilities. Her final words were: "This completes the reading of the list. Rank two clerk Inscribia Vultur is hereby stepping down for death-related reasons."

traits.locale_text: かつての総監は、生涯にわたって租税の会計業務を命じられた。数年間、彼女は書類の山に囲まれた狭い部屋に住み続け、ある日、やせ細った体から生命が失われていくのを感じた。彼女はわずかな部下を集め、様々な責務を丁寧に引き継いだ。最後の言葉はこうだった。「これにて名簿の読み上げを終えます。二等事務官インスクリビア・ヴァルターは、死亡に伴う理由により辞任いたします」

languages.text: Eski prefekt, ömrünün sonuna dek aşar muhasebesi görevine mahkûm edildi. Kâğıt tomarlarıyla dolu küçücük bir odada geçirdiği birkaç yılın ardından bir gün canının solmuş bedeninden süzüldüğünü hisseden prefekt, sayılı astını topladı ve envaiçeşit sorumluluğunu itinayla devretti. Son sözleriyse şunlar oldu: "Listenin okunması nihayete ermiştir. İkinci kademe kâtip İnscribia Vultur, ölüme ilişkin sebeplerden ötürü görevinden affını istemektedir."
languages.original_text: The former prefect was sentenced to tithe accounting duty for the rest of her life. For several years, she inhabited a tiny room stacked with papers, until one day, she felt the life going out of her withered body. She assembled her few subordinates and meticulously handed over her various responsibilities. Her final words were: "This completes the reading of the list. Rank two clerk Inscribia Vultur is hereby stepping down for death-related reasons."
